name: 1 Coin Can Change Your Life
description: $1 is a decentralized meme token on the Solana blockchain that satirizes modern value systems by transforming the symbol “one dollar” into a digital cultural movement. Launched without presale, roadmap, or team tokens, it embodies simplicity, irony, and community-led creativity. $1 is both a parody and a unifier — a minimalist experiment in what happens when belief alone becomes the currency. The utility of $1 lies in its universality — a meme currency representing simplicity, humor, and the collective belief in decentralized value. No complex staking or tokenomics — just one coin for everyone.
